item.title: Anything I could do better?
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:12, topic:373103”]Why do you have tv shows under movies?[/quote]When I took the picture I realized I had it that way, its since been moved.

[quote=“Mopman, post:10, topic:373103”]You have the strangest music collection ever.

I like this.[/quote]Haha, I know right. I used to have about 50 more artists but when I had to reformat last time I didn’t think of setting a partition for just for media.

Read full topic

item.title: Anything I could do better?
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:373103”]Obviously it’s all personal preference, but I know that if I was looking for ‘that one pic’, I’m not going to remember what file type it is.[/quote]I do find my self losing track of alot of text files, I have ~2,000 text files with random things and they aren’t titled correctly - its frustrating sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Anything I could do better?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Personally, I don’t like to organize things by file type, I like to organize by category. That way I can find all of my files from a certain topic in one place. All of my school photos, assignments, etc in one place. Your music folder looks great (not sorted by .mp3, .wav etc ;))

For your images folder, I would sort by topic more. Images -> 4Chan is good, but then you get into sorting by file type again.

Obviously it’s all personal preference, but I know that if I was looking for ‘that one pic’, I’m not going to remember what file type it is.

Read full topic
